name: RunBoy! Run to survive!
description:
RunBoy run and run, watch out for mutant rats and gas, try to stay alive until you reach the end.

 Commands: 

Use left and right on the keyboard to move, or the arrow keys on the gamepad.

 Key: A to use Dash, hold to keep running.

 Key: S to jump, if you're against the wall, keep pressing to go up jumping against it.

 Press Enter to pause the game, press R to restart the level.

 -GAMEPAD-

 Key: A, to jump 

Key: B, to use Dash, hold to keep running.

 Start, to pause the game, press Y to restart the level.

 Programming: Waldomiro(NomadKing)

 Tileset: Waldomiro(NomadKing) 

Sprites: The World End's With You (edited by NomadKing) 

Special thanks to my family and Marcos Game Dev, for being a great teacher and companion, and to all my classmates who supported me.
